favoriteMemory: Not quite sure there was one memory here that really stood out. I mean, when else in your life will you ever get a chance to have few (if any) responsibilities and be able travel around, engage in shenanigans and live in one of the most exuberant cities on Earth? The entire semester is one incredible memory.

degree: Bachelors of Science in Quantitative Finance
favoriteMemory: My favorite memory thus far was Freshman year during a massive blizzard that covered campus in 24 inches of snow. The memories made in those ensuing snow days were some of the richest yet.
My favorite memories at Oratory were those I made playing on the lacrosse team.
